title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3236/87 of 29 October 1987 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3472/85 on the buying in and storage of olive oil by intervention agencies
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 3236/87
of 29 October 1987
amending Regulation (EEC) No 3472/85 on the buying in and storage of olive oil by intervention agencies
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 3742/85 is replaced by the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 November 1987.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 October 1987.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No 172, 30. 9. 1966, p. 3025/66.
(2) OJ No L 183, 3. 7. 1987, p. 7.
(3) OJ No L 183, 3. 7. 1987, p. 12.
(4) OJ No L 333, 11. 12. 1983, p. 5.
(5) OJ No L 336, 29. 11. 1986, p. 39.
